content:
This cute guy just came into my class. Ofc he decided to sit with Hanzo and his group but he keeps looking back at me, or maybe cuz i kept looking at him urk! (*/ω＼*)

Also, Sumii told me that she saw Mr. Horaju and Mr. Ren speaking to each other. They seem a bit too close as friends. Like exchanging bento boxes! щ(ʘ╻ʘ)щ
